body: hi everyone i have a problem with honeybee component, it's red and gives me this error ~~>  1. Solution exception:Expecting property name: line 1 column 1490313 (char 1490313) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/AY5n-P37pIVZV2rFek2C17cq9qgwxYLuu8wu63KB*5znY-uIGwEpSoA*F2kmFe*3Q1eznh-YmuTfPZLXVZCP0Jas7nU1B2jx/honeybeecomponent.jpg) also the component createHBSrfs gives the error ~~> 1. Solution exception:honeybee_EPZone   and i dont know if it is related to honeybee component error or not?! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/AY5n-P37pIUi9221DGhqglwUyMylWm5aX-S9kbJLwoBVCT-m0JcQfSr8G8YhVW2WPu3koHgUHxUU85QwA7-zhktGH*D9K2F4/creatHBSrfs.jpg)

replies.body:
Hi Mahdye,

Can you open the attached file and let me know if you still have the issue.

Mostapha

hi Mostapha,

no, i still have the same problem!
I wonder if this is an issue with downloading json files. Can you send a screen capture of the error report so I can see in which line the error is happening. Thanks!

It is the issue with JSON files. Try to download these two files manually and copy them into Ladybug's default folder. Close Rhino and Grasshopper and open it again.



[https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/master/...](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/master/resources/OpenStudio_Standards.json)

[https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/master/...](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/master/resources/OpenStudioMasterTemplate.idf)
honeybee is now flying :) thank you so much.
